alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:25PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN KIT CARSON AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 324 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was located 5 miles northwest of Kanorado, moving south at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Burlington and Kanorado. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 439 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 189 and 198. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
